website_summaries.verdict: Not only does this well-made round brush style different lengths with ease, but the size and natural boar bristles are perfect for almost any hair texture, from straight strands to tight curls.
pros: This brush features a 1.75-inch barrel that works well for various lengths
Genuine ash wood handle stands up to heat
Natural boar bristles make hair soft and shiny and may reduce frizz on some textures
Ceramic barrel is effective at distributing heat evenly
cons: Bristles occasionally shed, which could be frustrating for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Going back.
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this brush. Doesn't pull through my hair without effort, and never hits my scalp unless I force it. I have fine hair, so I'm surprised it was so difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave's wife

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair and not a lot of it but I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's to soft. It will not go through to my scalp. I have fine hair and not a lot of it but I was still not able to brush my hair all the way through without pushing and forcing it. The quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, well made, fast shipping, very happy with this purchase! ;)
customer_reviews.author: stefan

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Spent a little more than I liked on this “new” brush to only get a used brush. Not cool Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT NATURAL BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH!
customer_reviews.text: A natural Boar Bristle Brush is costly but is better for the health your hair because it is natural and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: foxxygranny

customer_reviews.title: A large amount of the bristles fell out the first ...
customer_reviews.text: A large amount of the bristles fell out the first time I used it. Still a well made brush but I was definitely expecting more...
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair shine, especially when I use the Glimmer Shine spray from Moroccanoil too! I have shoulder length fine hair that can tangle easy but this brush fixes that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful as hoped
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it and how gentle it is. It doesn't really go through to the scalp which is a little disappointing so I usually use 2 brushes - this one on its own wouldn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Young

customer_reviews.title: Teases with Ease
customer_reviews.text: Moroccan oil everything is great! While it teases hair with ease, when you are done with your style for the day it easily combs right out! Those boar bristles are very effective but forgiving to the hair!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It feels great to brush my hair with this product. I have brushing when I have time after work. My hair does look very shiny and healthy. I am thinking of buying one for my cousin as a present. This reminds me of a brush my mother bought me in the '60's.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for just s little teasing to give you that fullness
customer_reviews.author: K5

customer_reviews.title: Wonder,gentle brush.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful,gentle brush. My hair doesn't break off anymore and seems stronger and thicker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I really like that hair brush! It's helping my hair even to grow!
customer_reviews.author: Aline Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great for teasing and getting those small hairs under control that want to flip up on short hair.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this brush....LOVE IT!! Love to brush my hair with it...Love how it makes my hair feel. Would highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good shipping, timing, and care of product - product as described
customer_reviews.author: mjv

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bristle's are too soft, they don't go through my long hair.
customer_reviews.author: cynmarr

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, buy a denman D82
customer_reviews.text: This brush is horrible, I bought it after my denman handle broke and I liked the fact that it was made out of wood. But the bristles are hard and not even in size so they rip your hair rather than smooth it out. Unless there is some way to soften to bristles I would not bother purchasing it. It is made in the same way as the Sibel 74 but costs 6 times the price and that was an awful brush. Save your money and buy a denman instead
customer_reviews.author: acb8284747274

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Boar Bristle Brush
product_meta.description:
Size:45 mm Round BrushBoost the health and natural beauty of your hair with the Moroccanoil Boar Bristle 45 mm Round Brush, designed for the creation of voluminous blow-dry looks and smooth, sleek styles. The brush is handmade with premium boar bristles, which massage the scalp and distribute the hair’s natural oils along the shaft, enhancing shine and smoothness. With repeated use, hair becomes softer, healthier and easier to manage. The durable ash wood handle is lightweight and heat-resistant for effortless styling. Handmade from the finest materials and performance-tested on the runway, it brings an unparalleled styling experience to your home. Suitable for all hair types; ideal for coarse, dry hair.

BRAND STORY
A story of success, an impulse for innovation and a relentless pursuit of high-performing oil-infused beauty products fashioned an iconic brand: Moroccanoil.
